analysis.description:
CryptoHill.checkDate (/unique_chucks/21/0xc726ac92955fc07ad09c5af4827418f581e37017.sol#69-89) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- leader.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc726ac92955fc07ad09c5af4827418f581e37017.sol#76)

CryptoHill.checkDate (/unique_chucks/21/0xc726ac92955fc07ad09c5af4827418f581e37017.sol#69-89) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > (startingTime + gameLength) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc726ac92955fc07ad09c5af4827418f581e37017.sol#72-87)

CryptoHill.overthrow (/unique_chucks/21/0xc726ac92955fc07ad09c5af4827418f581e37017.sol#89-127) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (challengeHash ^ leaderHash) > difficulty (/unique_chucks/21/0xc726ac92955fc07ad09c5af4827418f581e37017.sol#104-105)
	- challengeHash == leaderHash (/unique_chucks/21/0xc726ac92955fc07ad09c5af4827418f581e37017.sol#100-101)

	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
